name: Project Boost (itch) (BetaDv)
description:
ROCKET BOOST

Finish the Levels for no Reward! So Exciting!

TIPS

- If you experience too much lag, you can opt into downloading the Windows Version instead,

- In one of the 4 levels there's a pretty useful skip.

HOW TO PLAY

You have to Finish 4 Levels by using your Rocket and get through the Gaps, the game is pretty easy in itself.

Watch out for Lag though. (Even I can't run it with my 2010 PC)

CONTROLS

A - Turn Left,

D - Turn Right,

SPACE - Start Flying,

ESCAPE - Quit Game (Only for Downloaded Builds).

CHEATING CONTROLS

C - Toggle ON or OFF all the Collisions, including Winning Block,

I - Toggle ON or OFF invincibility, you can still use the Winning Block.

INFORMATIONS

This game was made for a Game Dev course, the Unity Course 3D which you can find on Udemy.

With the Goal of Finishing the 4 Levels Provided in the game at the current Time.

POSSIBLE ISSUES

- Massive lag on Older / Bad computers,

- The Post Processing not Showing sometimes for some odd Reason (To Fix this Install the Windows Build, if you're on a Different Operating System, Sorry).

POSSIBLE UPDATES

- Adding Visual Indicators for Levels (to show which one you are at) and Cheating Controls (when they're enabled or disabled), such as UI.

CREDITS

A GAME BY BETADV!

PROGRAMMING: BETADV,

LEVEL DESIGN: BETADV,

ART: BETADV.

Any Feedback will be Appreciated!
